RelatedSentence: This will mark the second time the Spurs and Thunder clashed for the West crown .
The last time was in 2012 where OKC defeated the Spurs , 4-2 .
In addition , the Thunder swept the Spurs in the regular season 4-0 but will be taking on the Spurs without Serge Ibaka who is out for the postseason with a calf injury .
